value.message: Error is logged without stack trace or additional context in catch block.
value.suggestion: Log both error message and stack trace, and include relevant context such as user ID and order data.

value.message: Order creation uses userId and productId from client-side context without explicit backend ownership verification, risking IDOR if backend does not validate ownership.
value.suggestion: Ensure backend API (createOrder) verifies that userId and productId belong to the authenticated user and do not rely solely on IDs from client input.

value.message: Redirects using navigate() with static paths are safe, but if paths become dynamic or user-controlled, must validate against an allow list.
value.suggestion: If redirect URLs are ever derived from user input, validate them against a predefined allow list before calling navigate().
